overwrite.description: How to handle existing files (error=fail, skip=keep existing, overwrite=replace)

verify_checksums.description: Verify checksums during extraction if available

preserve_permissions.description: Preserve Unix file permissions from archive

max_entries.description: Maximum number of entries to extract (decompression bomb protection)
